document.full_text: arsenal is poised to become the fifth premier league club to have an american owner after sports tycoon stan kroenke agreed a deal for a takeover that values the soccer club at 731 million pounds ($1.2 billion).
document.title: arsenal agrees to $1.2 billion takeover by kroenke
lines_and_colors: arsenal is poised to become the fifth premier league club to have an american owner after sports tycoon stan kroenke agreed a deal for a takeover that values the soccer club at 731 million pounds ($1.2 billion).
